title: Nock Hand Guards for MTB protect knuckles and brake levers, damp impacts
content:
Whether their marketing is so bold or not, Sendhit have just released a new hand guard design set to challenge industry leaders AVS. Made in France with an aluminium mounting bracket, Nock Hand Guards come in at 169g per pair so they are a little heavier than most designs. What’s unique about these however is […]
